A group of students at a school were curious about the clouds in the sky. One day, they noticed that a cloud looked like their school. They decided to investigate further and discovered that the cloud was actually their school. The students were amazed and excited to be inside a cloud. They learned about the power of imagination and the importance of following your dreams. The school in the cloud became a symbol of hope and inspiration for the students.

A group of teachers were worried about the lack of funding for their school. One day, they noticed a cloud that looked like their school. They decided to take a closer look and discovered that the cloud was their school. The teachers were amazed and grateful to have found a solution to their financial problems. The school in the cloud became a symbol of hope and inspiration for the teachers.
